nlp.diff
Class XML

java.lang.Object
  nlp.diff.XML

public class XML
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper for handling XML. 

 Typical use:
 Document d1 = XML.blank();
 Document d2 = XML.parse(System.in);
 XML.write(d2,System.out);
